channel.title: World Of Warcraft
channel.description:
Well, i'm going to get world of warcraft but before i do i just wanted to know... when you subscribe are you subscribing for just one of your characters or all of them?
Also i'm going to be alliance but which is the best one?

item.title: World Of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

You get too addicted.

Read full topic

item.title: World Of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @cow821 cow821
item.description:
@cow821 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:17, topic:26885”][quote author=slinkyman24 link=topic=40080.msg490968#msg490968 date=1164012148]

Runescape is crap …

why are you here then…we hack runescape and cheat it
[/quote]

We hack runescape?
Actually majority of members here probably really do think that runescape sucks. I’m here because I like the community. Just like spending spare time here.

Face it, runescape is all grind. No gameplay what-so-ever(woo hoo click on a rock for 6 hours!). Graphics 1/10, game play 1/10, what do you people see in it? There are so many better games out there, why even bother. I can’t even see how this is matter of oppinion thing, I mean there just is no value in playing it.

As far as I know, WoW is 10k times more the game then rs will ever be. But I pretty much hate mmorpg’s now, more into the sports and fps.[/quote]
Hellz Yah…Hellz Yah

Read full topic

item.title: World Of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“S!ms, post:11, topic:26885”][quote author=junkj link=topic=40080.msg486598#msg486598 date=1163971517]
I dont like WoW it sucks.Its impossible to lvl up.
I played it on a trial acount you buys skills… you can only have 2 skills!
RS lets you have…1…2…3…20 something skills!(few are members)
WoW… the introduction is nasty (impossibly awsome)
But you need alota training to lvl up
i had a horde and alliance acount.
Horde lvl 10 hunter w/ pet and a tuaren which i hated.
Alliance(i like this team alot…) a few night elves some dwarfs no gnomes and a human.
I give it a 3 rank.
I say runescape is alot better.

P.S. Alliance is better.
[/quote]

I say private servers are better.
Try ralph’s server. Look on www.wowstatus.net[/quote]

Lol, ralph is a noob look at my sig

Read full topic

Rum0:

is there a way to get full wow for free :P?

Yes… the trial download has the full game. You just get a 10 day trial account.

Oh well im getting it on CD so that i dont have to use 5gb of space downloading it.

[/quote]
why are you here then…we hack runescape and cheat it[/quote]

We hack runescape?
Actually majority of members here probably really do think that runescape sucks. I’m here because I like the community. Just like spending spare time here.

Face it, runescape is all grind. No gameplay what-so-ever(woo hoo click on a rock for 6 hours!). Graphics 1/10, game play 1/10, what do you people see in it? There are so many better games out there, why even bother. I can’t even see how this is matter of oppinion thing, I mean there just is no value in playing it.

As far as I know, WoW is 10k times more the game then rs will ever be. But I pretty much hate mmorpg’s now, more into the sports and fps.

item.title: World Of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

[quote=“junkj, post:8, topic:26885”]I dont like WoW it sucks.Its impossible to lvl up.
I played it on a trial acount you buys skills… you can only have 2 skills!
RS lets you have…1…2…3…20 something skills!(few are members)
WoW… the introduction is nasty (impossibly awsome)
But you need alota training to lvl up
i had a horde and alliance acount.
Horde lvl 10 hunter w/ pet and a tuaren which i hated.
Alliance(i like this team alot…) a few night elves some dwarfs no gnomes and a human.
I give it a 3 rank.
I say runescape is alot better.

P.S. Alliance is better.[/quote]

I say private servers are better.
Try ralph’s server. Look on www.wowstatus.net
